title: Teen killed, two injured in Osaka stabbing, suspect arrested
desc: Police have arrested a 21-year-old man on suspicion of murder after a stabbing attack on Saturday night in the bustling Dotonbori district of Osaka City, western Japan.

title: Nancy Guthrie disappearance: Sheriff says no arrests, none remain in custody after major operation
desc: FBI and local authorities conducted a major operation in connection to the Nancy Guthrie case, as at least three people were detained and a vehicle was hauled off. The 84-year-old mother of NBC "Today" host Savannah Guthrie has been missing for two weeks.

title: AEW Grand Slam Australia Results: February 14, 2026 - MJF vs. Hangman Set for Revolution, Yuta Shaved Bald, More
desc: What a fantastic start to the weekend with AEW Grand Slam Australia from Sydney on TNT and streaming on HBO Max! Between homecomings, four title matches, a shaved head and so much more, it was a jam-packed night in front of our great fans Down Under!
